lender.name: John & Nancy
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is not charity, just common sense.
lender.occupational_info: I teach medical students and Nancy is a retired nurse who volunteers in the community.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I care about the welfare of others.
lender.occupational_info: Presently disabled.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.occupation: Deputy Legal Counsel, Governor Jennifer Granholm
lender.loan_because: "Each time a man stands up for an ideal, or acts to improve the lot of others, or strikes out against injustice, he sends forth a tiny ripple of hope, and crossing each other from a million different centers of energy and daring, those ripples build a current that can sweep down the mightiest walls of oppression and resistance." Robert F. Kennedy
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer who works for the Governor of Michigan, one of the fifty United States.

lender.name: syarif
lender.loan_because: i need more budget to business about small shop to sell snack,rice vegetable oil
lender.occupational_info: early morning, iam going to market in my town. is far 10 KM form my home. after that, i open my small shop for buying in than more poor people

lender.name: Francoise
lender.loan_because: the help I receive is priceless, hope my $25 can help someone else

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: A right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the construction of about $45 Million of buildings and infrastructure within the State of Wi.

lender.name: Fuad Dusaqih / Pongky
lender.loan_because: I would like to develop my status from retail seller to be an agent of a product i.e. Tyre Guard.
lender.occupational_info: First l must put some advertisement on the automotive tabloid to take consumer interesting and make some trial by going tyravelling to ensure consumer that this product is really works.

lender.name: Isla Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I owned a business in the world's most prosperous country and had to close this past December due to the economy but I love doing this. It makes me feel less worthless.
lender.occupational_info: I am just taking up space currently.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: A small amount of money loaned to people in poor countries goes a long way toward providing for their economic stability.
lender.occupational_info: Retirement gives me time to provide assistance to those in need so that they and their families may one day experience an easier life.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: A small inconvenience to me may represent a major opportunity for someone else; and Lord knows, we need to improve the quality of life in poorer parts of the planet.

lender.name: Olivia
lender.loan_because: someone else needs it more than i do!

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to use money than giving people the opportunity to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Never-ending process of learning

lender.name: george
lender.loan_because: It is important to give back.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I own a natural food grocery store and restaurant.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I needed a way to contribute to my global community from "The Hub of Illinois," Springfield.
lender.occupational_info: I am just one cog in a giant wheel

lender.name: Awan
lender.loan_because: I want to open a shop as secondary job
lender.occupational_info: I sell supplement food and drink

lender.name: Debby
lender.loan_because: I have seen in the former Soviet Union how you can change people's opinions about the U.S. by acts of friendship. I have also seen how well money in the right hands can help change a life. Every person on this planet has the same basic needs and motivations and everyone has a dream that sometimes just needs a little boost to come true.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I believe that sustainability and local commerce are the basis of growth and support of family and neighborhoods.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children and adults with physical handicaps and mental retardation to help them learn to communicate with family and friends. I am a spinner and weaver.

lender.name: Joan/Keith
lender.loan_because: This seems like a more direct way to reach people who need a little help financially.
lender.occupational_info: My husband & I are retired Registered Nurses.

lender.name: Ann B. Beeder M.D.
lender.occupational_info: Community and Public Health Programs in New York City

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I am an avid traveler. I have seen a lot. I just want to give back to some of the people in the countries I have visited - or am planning to visit.
lender.occupational_info: Creative persona.

lender.name: Banks Family
lender.loan_because: We want to make an impact in someone's life!

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I like Kiva because it's an organization that helps people to help themselves.

lender.name: Vasiliki
lender.loan_because: I hope to make the world a little bit better.
lender.occupational_info: I write programs that help people design electronics.

lender.name: Renee & Brian
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people that may not be as fortunate as I have been.

lender.name: Daryl
lender.loan_because: I lived in Honduras for 2 years and saw dire poverty first hand. I want to do whatever I can to help permanently overcome that poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am an MBA student studying international finance. I'm thinking of entering the micro-finance world.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to better their lives.

lender.name: KirstenQF
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky and I know it. I want to share my luck.
lender.occupational_info: I'm raising an infant son. When I'm not at home, I do skincare and massage therapy in a little office in downtown San Francisco. I am blessed to be surrounded by smiling, happy people every day.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a office and do a lot of work on the computer.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: Thanks to Frontline, I became aware of micro-lending. I used to believe that I had resources to make a difference in my corner of the world, one person at a time. I am thrilled to have the chance to support other folk who are trying to change their stars.

lender.name: carolyn
lender.loan_because: I travel all over the world and I enjoy helping the less fortunate in some of those countries that I visit.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Physical Education to 12, 13, and 14 year old boys and girls. the sports that I teach are soccer, football,badminton,basketball and many more fun games.

lender.name: Pete & Angela
lender.loan_because: we saw the news piece on ABC and felt touched by the story and we wanted to do what we could to help out.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home Wife. My husband, Pete is an Engineer for an Aerospace Company.

lender.name: Hernan The Civil
lender.loan_because: I can... a little.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Civil Engineer.

lender.name: Mark and Rene
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us beyond measure.

lender.name: george
lender.occupational_info: I support large computer systems.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I love empowering those who need a hand up, not a hand out!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a photographer, a writer and a musician,

lender.name: Heather & Mike
lender.loan_because: Many problems in the world today stem from poverty. Many people could improve their lives if only someone would give them the tools to do so. By loaning we help provide those much needed monetary tools. In a meaningful way we help our fellow man and in turn we are part of a wave which helps make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: One of us repairs computers and electronics and the other helps people manage their money.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: On this planet, to survive we must share. How we share may differ, but we must share for there to be a future.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: There are people in the world who have high hopes and large aspirations and the only thing holding them back from following their dreams is a lack of funds.
lender.occupational_info: I assist producers and correspondents at a national television news network.

lender.name: FYB
lender.loan_because: Because we are fortunate enough that we can.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: These entrepreneurs need a little help right now...and who doesn't need help every now and then?

lender.name: RJM
lender.loan_because: I am not wealthy in U.S. terms, but compared to the rest of the world, I am quite well off. I can afford to help. And, hopefully make the world better!
lender.occupational_info: I build a better present and future in my community by cultivating trees in the community forest.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to improve their lives and make things a little easier. I admire women who are working while raising children and trying to continue their education, as I believe that education has the potential to impact not only the individual but eventually their neighbors, towns and countries.
lender.occupational_info:
I am currently an artist working with clay. I make handbuilt ceramic sculptures and other decorative items, with a particular interest in primitive pit-firing techniques and Raku.
I was very fortunate to become involved in the computer industry over 45 years ago. I am now retired, but previously worked as a software engineer and then eventually a senior manager for a major computer software company.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: My family and I have been blessed. After having the opportunity to work and visit some of these countries, I realized that all of us are one and that our goals in life, no matter what language or what color we are, are basically the same around the world. So why don't help each other to reach them.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy working as a teacher because I'm not only able to teach a curriculum but I'm able to plant a seed about social justice, and issues that will affect my students after I'm gone.

lender.name: Dindin
lender.loan_because: i wish to develop business
lender.occupational_info: Rent PC

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I have so much to be thankful for and want to be a part of a smaller and more peaceful world.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: there is no substitute for direct action.
lender.occupational_info: improving the quality and security of cellular phones and the networks they rely on.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the many blessings in my life. Sharing some of my abundance is an expression of that gratitude.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a family owned jewelry store. It is the oldest business in our town (92 years). We sell fine jewelry and gifts.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to see the world

lender.name: Jon and Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to help small business owners in developing countries to become more self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I design Railroad Signal Systems and my wife works with children in a day care center

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed and want to share my blessings with the rest of the world. I think it is dumb luck that I am where I am and I owe it to others to help them make it in this world
lender.occupational_info: I work for a huge corporation as a manager and teacher/mentor.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a brilliant idea and a great way to make a big difference in the lives of people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for AT&T as a writer, focused mostly on social media. I live in San Francisco with my husband Gordon. We have been a couple for 18 years and were married on Aug. 29, 2008.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: My job is very demanding...but very fulfilling. I work for a mental health facility and do my best at giving a voice to the misunderstood.

lender.name: Peter & Kim
lender.loan_because: I have had a very fortunate life and it is time to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I make my living as an artist selling mostly at street art shows, my web site and I wholesale to stores.

lender.name: farida
lender.loan_because: i need money to start my own business
lender.occupational_info: i'd like to have and run my own cyber cafe downtown

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I can. I have enough money, and when I think about how much money I waste on useless stuff, well, it seems ridiculous to not share it with anyone and everyone who needs it.
lender.occupational_info: My real day job is pretty meaningless - I work in an office, I'm not helping the world, only myself and my family......when I see what others are doing with so little, I have to help. I'm amazed, humbled and embarrassed.

lender.name: gulaid
lender.loan_because: Because I care. grow up in Africa, I can see how poverty can be crippling. I spend my money on silly things all the time. why not dedicate small amount to lift someone out of limiting life and help the next generation to see the world differently.
lender.occupational_info: work in news and media production.

lender.name: ABDULLAH
lender.loan_because: I want house for my family.
lender.occupational_info: I'm operator.

lender.name: Basem
lender.loan_because: hello every body iam from syria iam 25 ineed 2000$ for Sewing clothing pair of jeans iwish from every body see my ask help me please help me iwish the help best regard
lender.occupational_info: my current job are so hard iam working as work 12 hours daily for less 200$ monthly

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I want to invest in other people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Geography, Tecnhnology, and World History to High School Students

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: This is an excellent program to help those who want to help themselves and their communities.

lender.name: John & Everette
lender.loan_because: I'm in a position to be able to help others and find it rewarding to give something back to our world. Sometimes I'm ashamed of the lifestyle I take for granted here in United States...I'm happy to be able help those less fortunate than myself. I'm also honored and humbled to be able to participate in this form with people who have sincerely touched my heart.
lender.occupational_info:
I've always been employed in some sort of profession where I'm able to help people in some manor. Currently I'm responsible for the manufacture of viral and bacterial testing products used to identify many illnesses found in humans and animals throughout the world.
Pictured is my dog, Everette...he was a Guide Dogs of America trainee that could not be placed with a blind person so he ended up living with me.

lender.name: ExtendingHisLove
lender.loan_because: He who shows kindness to a poor man gives to the Lord and He will pay him in return for his good act.

lender.name: Jud and Shawnee
lender.loan_because: we want to help people help themselves...
lender.occupational_info: Shawnee is a video producer and Jud is a visual effects artist.

lender.name: Geoffrey
lender.loan_because: Sharing is caring
lender.occupational_info: Tourist industry in Hawaii

lender.name: Bruce Chou
lender.loan_because: I'm trying to meet altruistic, creative, or generous people in California. I'm a design freak, optimist, and futurist. Feel free to write me at doctorchou@gmail.com
lender.occupational_info: drug pusher

lender.name: John
lender.occupation: Faith-based speaker to recovering drug addicts

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I'm more fortunate than 95% of the people on this planet and I want to share what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am begining my own business making and selling soap. If this business takes off, part of the proceeds will go to providing more loans through Kiva.

lender.name: TERRY
lender.loan_because: Every one deserves a chance, to work for them self,to support their family's and feel dignity in working I am Gratefull to be a part of this, and hope to see kiva and all microfinance go & grow and touch hearts & lives around the globe one loan at a time.....imagine
lender.occupational_info: I help people to re-build credit or attain new credit to purchase automobiles

lender.name: Shmoo
lender.occupational_info: Destroyed by greedy investment bankers.

lender.name: Cathreina
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Aviva
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: God has given me everything I have, and wants me to share His gifts with others.

lender.name: pascal
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in improving their life conditions
lender.occupational_info: I am organising events, I design and deliver training, I do management consulting

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I understand the need

lender.name: eMicrofinance Club
lender.occupation: Microfinance Club of the Euroclear group

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: We often take for granted the blessings that we have. So one must give back -- It is the Law of Reciprocity
lender.occupational_info: My work is in helping others achieve true wealth, which includes health (physical, emotional, and spiritual) as well as the freedom that comes with financial well-being.

lender.name: Gabrijela
lender.loan_because: Our small amounts can really change someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I've been working at the bank.

lender.name: rina
lender.loan_because: i need a working capital to run my free lance internet base marketing business.
lender.occupational_info: i offer handycrafts items - made by local artisan in bali via internet base marketing. i found couple of serious buyers but sometimes the order can't be process because we don't have capital. i am work with several rural village house wives - who needs money for the family. they are very talented but don't have enough capital to grow the business

lender.name: Rami
lender.loan_because: Im from iraq .. Spickeng Only Arabic .. .

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I make custom camera cables, remote triggers, and new gadgets for photographers.

lender.name: Surekha
lender.loan_because: I believe that it provides an instrument for aspiring people to stand on their feet. I believe in "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime"

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: It's amazing what people can do when they have the resources to help themselves. I want to give a helping hand up to those with the desire to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: Small business owner and human resources professional.

lender.name: Pura Joko
lender.loan_because: I need to expand and improved my Market because, the order of Job increased by significan and i ned satisfied my customer
lender.occupational_info: The Fiberglass Manufacture is make product from Raw material ( Resin & Glass ) with some methode will produce the custumize product like Pipe, Storage Tank, Roof Light, Laminate Steel, Tube setler, etc. The product of FRP will appply to Waste Water System, Oil & GAs Industry, Pulp & Paper Industry, Construction Steel / Civil, Power Plant Project and many more.

lender.name: Jan and Eliot
lender.loan_because: Being able to share our resources with others working their way out of poverty is deeply satisfying. We started life together as Peace Corps Volunteers in the Philippines and have worked ever since then for non-profits committed to making the world a better place. We've been blessed with rich opportunities and hope to be able to provide assistance to others with dreams for their families and communities.

lender.name: Freddy
lender.loan_because: Loan for my college, i got problem with my college and i need money for to complete the study Contact me for more information
lender.occupational_info: I make the blog for the monthly income and as a seller broker of computer stuf, from my friend store

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We develop websites and patient education videos for the health care community globally.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people to help themselves.

lender.name: Yourlink2asia
lender.loan_because: The world is not fair, we want to do our best to make it more equal.
lender.occupational_info: Design and production.

lender.name: Hanisah
lender.loan_because: I need for my business food

lender.name: Roby
lender.loan_because: I want to share the opportunities I have had and give back to those with the initiative to move forward.

lender.name: Dan and Jodie
lender.loan_because: We have traveled the world and seen people living in difficult circumstances. We realize how very fortunate we are.
lender.occupational_info: We help others to buy and sell homes and land.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: it is a simple way to help others
lender.occupational_info: I do my best to raise compassionate and responsible individuals

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: Im an entrepaneur and I like to share my success's with those that need help !
lender.occupational_info: I sell the stoves,ovens, refrigerators and supplies to run a restaurant,

lender.name: K&M
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing. A hand up is better than a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to change the world, one little corner at a time.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with others.

lender.name: Chris & Janis
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can. It's that simple. The opportunity to make a positive impact on someone else's life so easily doesn't take much deliberation.

lender.name: GrowStepByStep
lender.loan_because: Believing in others and to help make their dream come true is our dream as well.
lender.occupational_info: I am full time employee who enjoys her work. I might not have much money, but with my friends we offer our services such as web site design etc. to start the business. Visit our web site and maybe you will find what you need.

lender.name: .Ai
lender.loan_because: This is an easy way to make a difference and a great use of technology.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because:
I like to help those who wish to help themselves.
This is also a good example for my children. Showing them that instead of governmental handouts being given to everyone, there is another way. The good, hard working people in this world will act honorably and work towards bettering themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help lead a group of people who are responsible for ensuring internet access worldwide.

lender.name: keats
lender.loan_because: I believe we should help each other.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I'm passionate about helping others. And would rather be doing that every day.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have been richly blessed in my life and wish to pass on opportunities I have received, so that others' lives might also be fulfilled and enriched through a purposeful life.

lender.name: Frederick
lender.loan_because: I hope I can help people who are trying to better themselves

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I like to help women be independent.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher as of August 1,2010.

lender.name: Kates Poppa
lender.loan_because: I have a rich life and it's a gift for me to be able to do something so small that makes such a big difference in the lives of good people.
lender.occupational_info: I write and edit for a large university. I get to help teachers, scholars, and scientists explain their interesting and valuable work to ordinary people.

lender.name: Harry Posey
lender.loan_because: Spirits move me. We're all in this together. Banks are no longer customer-friendly.
lender.occupational_info: I look for the good in people.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: Women in developing countries need all the help they can get.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Others haven't been as fortunate as I have.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: it's such minor amount to me, and offers so much potential to someone else.

lender.name: classof09
lender.loan_because: We would like to help people around the world out of poverty.

lender.name: mohammad
lender.loan_because: TO OPEN A NEW BUSINESS THAT HELP ME IN FUTURE.
lender.occupational_info: i am a student who study in univerity and i dont have an income so i am trying to get a lend to open a small business to depend on myslf in future

lender.name: JOHN
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Im a right wing libertarian/objectivist, a believer in the benefits of a free market economy, entrepreneurship and honesty. It's nice to help people help themselves and others, without any government involvement or coercion. Just basic benevolence I guess.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: It's an investment in humanity. What could be better than that?

lender.name: Jason and Janet
lender.loan_because: We consider it an investment in the future of humanity. Helping people help themselves leaves both parties feeling better about themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the unglamorous part of the Film industry. I move things around. My wife is a Registered Nurse and a teacher. She heals people and educates them.

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: I am impressed by those who work to be self sufficient under trying conditions or circumstances.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I create plans for big buildings

lender.name: Mack
lender.loan_because: it gives me the opportunity to make a difference in the world, however small it may be
lender.occupational_info: I work for a managed care program in Texas that provides healthcare to people who financially cannot afford healthcare. I visit with the doctors that participate with the plan and recruit new doctors to join

lender.name: Tori
lender.loan_because: I can! What a creative, wonderful, brilliant, yet SIMPLE way to reach across the world and help somebody out.
lender.occupational_info: I facilitate interest-free microloans needed for health-related purposes.

lender.name: Kay and Dennis
lender.loan_because: We have been very fortunate in our lives and believe in giving back, especially to those less fortunate who are trying to make a better life for their families.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that my small contribution can make such a large impact on someone's life. I have so much . . . I can share.
lender.occupational_info: I do the accounting and IT work for a small grass seed business near my home.

lender.name: Sunny
lender.loan_because:
I am so blessed in my life and so full of gratitude! I love the concept of re-cycling the loan once it's paid back and re-loaning it. Kiva makes the world community a smaller place where we are all connected.
I love Kiva because I feel personally connected to the women to whom I loan. The women I loan to inspire ME!!

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: To demonstrate the love of Christ in a real and practical way.
lender.occupational_info: I help students in foreign countries come to the US for education.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I truly hope I can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Retired air traffic controller.

lender.name: Michele and Kaya
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to work from home while raising my daughter. My husband and I value the comfortable life we have built together, and appreciate the opportunity to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I handle the financial operation of a small livestock ranch, as well as scheduling shipments (over water) of livestock to and from Hawaii.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. A bit here, a bit there and we can change the world

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: It is important to share and pass the blessings along.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Christian spiritual leader

lender.name: EdZ
lender.loan_because:
I can't stop... it's like goodwill/karma nicotine!
"Do good with what thou hast, or it will do thee no good." -- William Penn, American colonial leader
"Sharing money is what gives it its value." -- Elvis Presley
To date: Loans to 65 different countries!

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I just like helping individuals and their families escape poverty. I am going to do this for a few months here, and see if this is a model that could be applied in my neighborhood (I live in an extremely poor neighborhhod just outside Washington, DC that has a high number of immigrants).
lender.occupational_info: Federal government contractor, national security work, various federal agencies

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way to contribute to people that are willing to work hard and better their lives.

lender.name: Nora & Meara
lender.loan_because: Our Nana got us started with Kiva so we could learn about helping other people.
lender.occupational_info: Our daddy is a merchant sailor and our mommy stays home to take care of us.

lender.name: carrie
lender.loan_because: "do unto others.... :)"

lender.name: The Snarky
lender.loan_because: I have been poor, and I want to help where and when I can.

lender.name: Herbert
lender.loan_because: A little amount can make a big difference.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I want to help others
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Production Technician for concerts, and theater.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to personaly help others to help themselves in developing counties.
lender.occupational_info: I repair refrigeration equipment like walk in coolers or freezers for storing food.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a university

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: It's a very cool concept. It works!
lender.occupational_info: I make movies.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to pursue a dream, make a living, feed their family, and live life with hope of a better tomorrow.

lender.name: Billy
lender.loan_because: It feels good to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I ask people questions about themselves so that they can find their own answers.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I saw the Kiva program profiled on ABC news and thought what a unique program to help others in the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: Brookview Press is a small, independently owned publisher located in Castleton-on-Hudson, about 2 hours north of New York City. We publish unique, designer-quality, trade paperback books in the literary nonfiction genre about nature and the environment, with a strong spirituality component.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: Because I like fish, seals and well fed people.

lender.name: Ainsley
lender.loan_because: I have a small business and remember how hard it was to get it started.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: To assist new businesses
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired newspaperman who writes poetry.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: We are a small business and are glad people invested in our company. So this is our way on passing it on.
lender.occupational_info: We are a manufacture of medical products for heart patients. We make a surgical bra and harness for people who have heart surgery.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate and would like to share some of my good fortune with people in other countries.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe it is my responsibility to lend a helping hand. The micro loans may be loaned to projects and people of my choice.
lender.occupational_info: I am a research chemist and was raised on a family farm in Florida. My parents struggled to survive on a small farm that raised vegetables and cattle, pigs, and poultry.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: It is a great idea to support others directly. Lending with Kiva is easy, fun, and important at the same time.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software systems that manage telephone networks.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: It allows me to help people from all over the world improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people who need surgery and make sure that they are asleep and comfortable during the operation.

lender.name: Bob & Jean
lender.loan_because: We love all our neighbors in the world community---and we look forward to a world where everyone has freedom from want, freedom from fear, freedom of speech, and freedom to worship. "If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him? Dear children, let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth". (1 John 3: 17-18)
lender.occupational_info: Before we retired, Jean taught medical-surgical nursing and Bob taught secondary school Honors and Advanced Placement Physics.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: Microloans are much more than just throwing money at a problem, they affect people directly. It's a very profound experience to actually see your loan help deserving and enterprising people in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies figure out how to market their products.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I am able
lender.occupational_info: microelectronics

lender.name: Shari
lender.loan_because: The Lord has blessed me and it is my purpose to help someone else. Imagine a world if we each helped one another. Hunger--what's that?!
lender.occupational_info: I represent people charged with crimes that cannot afford to hire an attorney. They do not have to pay me anything to represent them. It is FREE to each client. It is what I am meant to do.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: A little can do so much for so many people.

lender.name: Mia & Mason
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to achieve their dream.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I have been the benificiary of enormous amounts of support

lender.name: Debora
lender.loan_because: I love riding my bicycle and know how costly repairs can be. I'm grateful I can help so one else repair needed transportation.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do! If I can give someone a little bit of money so they can make their lives dream come true, I'm definitely all about that!
lender.occupational_info: Well, currently I'm working for a property tax consultant company.

lender.name: Hank
lender.loan_because: I believe micro loans are a great solution for lifting the poor out of poverty and raising the image of the richer nations among them.

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: It's a small way to show my support for people who are pursuing a better life.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Yesterday, I saw Kiva's story on PBS channel 12 in Denver. I was inspired by the grass roots approach of the organization and felt like it was a good fit for me.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I find this a much more personal form of helping eradicate poverty than contributions to charitable organizations because you know the individuals you are helping and their stories. It's a joy to see people become self-sustaining and able to help their families achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I love to help women and children become all they can be.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I help homeless people in my city to learn how to live independantly and get back on their feet. I also go to school and hope to begin teaching soon.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: I have a small business myself as do others in my family. We would like to see people with this same desire experience success.
lender.occupational_info: I produce videos, many concerning the subject of social justice

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: Loaning to others is loaning to all of us.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Seems like a good idea.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed to live in this country of abundance and I believe it is our moral obligation to give a "helping hand" to those less fortunate and those who have an opportunity through hard work and a goal to make their lives better and more meaningful.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social worker who works in a large hospital in California. I work with children who have congenital heart problems. It is very rewarding to see the little children get well with the proper medical treatment and support from the staff and their families.

lender.name: Nick and Jen
lender.loan_because: Stimulating entrepreneurship is the best way to reduce global poverty.

lender.name: Sue
lender.occupation: IT Professional and part time artist
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Liz
lender.occupational_info: I study the philosophy, literature and history of the ancient Greeks and Romans and I'm working for my PhD. I want to write my dissertation about the ethics of the family.

lender.name: Jarrod
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone has a right to build a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I sell vibratory conveyors that are used in various process industries (mining, foundry, recycling, pharmaceutical, foods, wood and paper).

lender.name: Thom
lender.loan_because: because I can and so many need

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I feel that I can do something small that will be huge for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure people are paid on time.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I love to help people help themselves! I have been in need myself .
lender.occupational_info: I own a musical instrument store

lender.name: Lou
lender.loan_because: We are all the same.

lender.name: Rhett Wertzbaugher
lender.loan_because: I hope that I can help someone better their life.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: My cup overflows.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: we all must help each other attain personal goals for the betterment of the individual and subsequently, humanity.
lender.occupational_info: I help bring medications, which can one day positively impact the lives of patients with cancer, to market.

lender.name: jody
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jessie
lender.loan_because: I identify with you all. I remember our own struggles to raise a family We too, had to raise children with not quite enough money. It turned out great - I hope your life is as good.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. But I still write a blog, and once wrote a book.

lender.name: harry
lender.loan_because: I started life in lower economic conditions and have learned the best way to become secure financially is to own a business.
lender.occupational_info: wholesale business

lender.name: Eleanora
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like, not to have things.I am a widow for 28 years, and it took a long time for someone to trust me and to loan me something.
lender.occupational_info: I do bookkeeping for several small Companies, the ones who cannot afford to pay for a fulltime person.And I love what I do.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: It is a gift to be able to give to others.
lender.occupational_info: Everyday I try to do my best, respect others and hope I've made things easier for someone who needed a little kindness.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: to whom much is given, much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the federal government in computer security

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Theodorus
lender.loan_because: need for make medical check up and certificate travel and fit , i need about $2000,00
lender.occupational_info: I get offer job at Hilton New York Hotel

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It is a good deed, and a humanitarian thing to do. If I have an amount of surplus, I see no reason not to loan.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a factory inspecting and assembling bearings (an automobile part.) My factory then ships these parts to customers who put them into vehicles to sell.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to make a difference.

lender.name: Sonoqui
lender.occupational_info: We consider ourselves to be stewards of our land, not land owners. We endeavor to work in a way that sustains the life and health of the land, the cattle and ourselves.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and wish to share God's gifts with others. There are many people in this world who work much harder than I, and I must admire them and do my best to help and support them in such a simple way.

lender.name: Doug
lender.whereabouts: Newcastle upon Tyne Tyne and Wear

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me in so many ways and I am thankful that I can help others in need. May He bless these industrious people.

lender.name: Frances
lender.loan_because: In today's world, we are all global neighbors who must understand and help each other.

lender.name: Traci & Jeff
lender.loan_because: We are blessed to be so fortunate & it feels good to help others in need.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: it reminds me that I am part of the world community
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer at Habitat for Humanity which helps build houses for people who need them. I volunteer to sell used clothing to people who need clothing. I work hard with my husband improving our house.

lender.name: D&M
lender.loan_because: You feed a man a fish, you have fed him for a day. you teach a man how to fish, you have fed him for life.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I have been doing volunteer work in third world countries for the past 20 years. I have seen what a difference a small loan can make to a family and community.

lender.name: Jasmine
lender.occupation: Young activist for third world countries

lender.name: Mary Fairy
lender.loan_because: I believe in the goodness of humanity. I am blessed and wish to share the wealth. I applaud your efforts!
lender.occupational_info: I have a degree in wildlife biology and have 10 acres in the country that I am trying to improve so that someday we can support a few goats, chickens, and rabbits.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I believe it's the right thing to do. :)
lender.occupational_info: I am a business owner and it is hard but rewarding work. I retail and wholesale craft supplies to small business owners via the Internet.

lender.name: Noel and Judith
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help others to use their gifts and passion for their family, their community and the world. Through our lives, others have helped us - now it is our turn.
lender.occupational_info: Noel's family motto: "Do all your work as to God." (It sounds better in Gaelic!)

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to live in a society where food is abundant and running water and shelter is taken for granted. This is my small contribution...
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom of three children. My son is 3 years old and I have twin girls who are 17 months old; to say the least I am very busy!

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are working to make a better life for themselves and their families. God has blessed me with a very fortunate life, and this is my way of giving back to the world. :)

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and I believe people should help others when they can.
lender.occupational_info: I sell relaxation, healing music composed by my husband (who has already passed on). His music is beautiful

lender.name: joshm
lender.loan_because: I loan because I've been where many people are now and I can relate to what they're going through. This is my way of giving back to all those people who helped me out before things turned around for me.
lender.occupational_info: I work for businesses as a consultant in advertising and public relations.

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: my summer school community psychology professor introduced me to this and I think this is a very rewarding way to help people around the world and make a significant difference in someone else's life!
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am a full-time college student at the University of Illinois at Chicago majoring in Psychology. I will be graduating in Spring of 2008

lender.name: Brian & Kim
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed!
lender.occupational_info: Awesome! Love what we do! Come join us!

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance and retirement is overrated

lender.name: jim & linda
lender.loan_because: GOD IS GREAT! HE provides me more than we need. My wife Linda and I are so blessed. " His mercy endures forever"
lender.occupational_info: Linda and I are nurses at City of Hope. We work with cancer patients. Our Catholic faith leads us to serve our Lord in works of charity to all. No conditions, no borders. Beautiful!

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: What a great way to make a difference in someone's life. It seems so personal even though the people are so far away.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Social Studies teacher. I teach high school, grades 9 - 12. I teach US History, American Government, Psychology and World Geography.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: My education is in economics and my faith is in the Holy Trinity. These types of loans provide market-based opportunities to people who have had far less opportunities than I've had. Jesus taught us that when we help the least among us we honor Him. Making microloans allows me to use the same dollars over and over to help others. Sustainable Philanthropy! How can it get better than that!
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell tiny ownership stakes in very large companies. I hope to buy low and sell high and make a profit. That's me chasing my son in the 50M dash. He's autistic and doesn't fully understand races but he loves being chased. As you can see, we're both having a great time.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired elementary (5th grade) teacher.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: My physical disability makes it too hard to travel far and help in person. It seems that the dollar buys a lot more in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I use math and science on computers to find and fix problems in large complex sets of numbers.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people with good ideas provide service to their communites and be able to provide a good life for their kids.
lender.occupational_info: I help direct the public buses so that people can get to work and to the store and kids can get to school.

lender.name: Teramis
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone out.
lender.occupational_info: I write novels.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want to be the change I wish to see in the world.

lender.name: Frank & Nicole
lender.loan_because: God told us "I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me." (Matthew 25:40)

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because:
I believe....
Our Lord spoke of investing talents...and as our seeds grow...we use the profits to reseed communities and spread God's love.
lender.occupational_info: You are loved/ You are valued. We believe in you and trust in you to keep your promises and your dreams.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I am very touched by the needs of women around the world. I want to stay connected and be part of the movement to end poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work with men, women and children who have serious mental health problems.

lender.name: Jim Smith
lender.loan_because: This idea is the coolest application of technology I've seen in a long time! Being a small part of it makes me feel like a mini-Bono!
lender.occupational_info: I direct the efforts of lots of software development nerds like me. They're good guys and gals and I'm the luckiest boss in the world!

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: It's exciting to watch others achieve their goals and know that we have been a small part of that. Good luck to everyone!
lender.occupational_info: Property Angels is an independent, family owned and run real estate business on the North Fork of Long Island, New York. We know what it takes to build a small business!

lender.name: Robert & Robin
lender.loan_because: What seems like such a small amount to us can be very meaningful to someone living in a different part of the world. It's wonderful being able to pool our individual resources to make a difference in peoples' lives.

lender.name: Meri
lender.loan_because: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has." -Margaret Meade-

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I deeply care about helping spread propserity throughout the world and I also feel very strongly towards rewarding the entrepreneurial spirit of others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for our news department at our local television station. I research and write stories for various news reports.

lender.name: Raphael
lender.loan_because: I believe good fortune in life should be shared with others. Then maybe one day poverty can be eliminated...
lender.occupational_info: I make the skys safe to fly for a major american airline company by inspecting airplanes for safety.

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: I would like to see a fairer, more equitable society, where everyone has an equal opportunity to survive and thrive.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: a small investment from me enables those who want to better themself and their family to a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I retired at age 56 as a Controller in private business to enjoy life and have never regretted the decision. As a confessed workaholic never took time for myself now life is great.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I spent a few years in Brasil as a teenager and the people there changed my life. I want to give something back and be a part of this vibrant emerging nation where just a little help can mean such a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help introduce new nursing students to the world of bacteria, viruses and other disease causing agents as well as training them how to protect themselves and their patients from disease.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I love those who work hard to pursuit their dreams. I am truely inspired by someone who have the courage to build their dreams and make it happen.
lender.occupational_info: I am a yoga teacher and a teacher teaches about energy. Basically helping people to find their inner-self!

lender.name: Neil Geisler
lender.occupational_info: I work on development of devices for disease diagnostics for global health care applications.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: Every little bit counts. No one person can make everything better everywhere, but thousands working together can make some things better in some places. It feels good to be able to be one of those people helping to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in raising chili peppers and garlic, selling them primarily at local Farmers Markets. I also make and sell jelly made from the peppers and a wonderful garlic jelly. Along with that I also raise some herbs and other plants for sale. I do have another job, but it is the farming I really enjoy. As far as writing, I do bits and pieces of writing here and there and am working on a couple of books.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: it's a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Kanyi
lender.loan_because: I give because serving other people is serving God.

lender.name: Alison & Andrew
lender.loan_because: We want to see real people using the money we loan.
lender.occupational_info: Alison is a travel and nature photographer and Andrew helps large companies use the software designed by his company.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to have a well paid career which gives me the freedom to make choices about where I visit, the sort of lifestyle I want to lead and the ability not to have too many financial worries
lender.occupational_info: I help organisations implement changes in their business to improve the way things are done, to reduce costs and enhance profits

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I have traveled extensively and seen first hand the people with the small shops and farms trying to improve their lives. These loans allow me to give back to the global community in a small but personal way.
lender.occupational_info: Management of multi-million dollar contracts with governments and private industries. I currently live and work in England.

lender.name: Niki
lender.occupational_info: graphic designer

lender.name: Margareta
lender.loan_because: It's a good idea to get my money working!
lender.occupational_info: Promotion

lender.name: Romi & Harold
lender.loan_because: People with marketable skills sometimes need a small helping hand to break through. We can afford to do lots of small helping.
lender.occupational_info: Retired Senior Chief Petty Officer, US Navy.

lender.name: Sren Kiilerich
lender.loan_because: I think the best you can do for anyone, is to give them their freedom - and Kiva is setting people free.

lender.name: radouan
lender.whereabouts: elkelaa des sraghna elkelaa des sraghna
lender.loan_because: je suis un informaticien i need a help
lender.occupational_info: je suis un informaticien i need a help analyste en informatique de gesrion

lender.name: Inne
lender.loan_because: I believe in the concept of Kiva. I trust it more than the way big NGOs operate. And in the end it's all about people helping people. The less noise between them the better ;-)
lender.occupational_info: I design products or solutions to problems. Years ago I made an artificial leg for landmine vitims in Cambodia and a new way to detect landmines (by using trained sniffing rats - they won't get harmed!). To read more, please visit: http://www.xs4all.nl/~inne/vs/legprot.htm or http://www.xs4all.nl/~inne/vs/report.htm or http://www.apopo.org Today I have a small business in making websites where people meet and share knowledge (web 2.0)

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I am able to
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school history

lender.name: omar
lender.loan_because: I want to still in my country Syria, but I've to do the mandatory milatery service (2 years) unless I pay $3000. So I've to leave my family to go to K.S.A or U.A.E to work for 5 years then I could pay $5000 to free myself. I can pay now cause I lived in K.S.A for 12 years. So the laws here allow me to pay $3000. I want to live in my country with my family , having my own work with a good position in a good company
lender.occupational_info: I'm a websites programmer, Oracle OCA (database administrator). working in IT technology field.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: This is a way that I can get involved in helping people improve their lives without having to give a lot at one time.
lender.occupational_info: I assist attorneys with their work. I work with people who have been injured in car accidents or on the job to try to make sure the insurance companies pay them what they deserve.

lender.name: LORENZO
lender.loan_because: IF I CAN HELP SOMEONE GET CLOSER TO THEIR DREAMS THEN MAYBE THEY WILL PAY IT FORWARD AND CONTINUE TO HELP SOMEONE ELSE.
lender.occupational_info: I HELP YOUTH HELP THEMSELVES TOWARDS COMPETING AT A VARSITY AND COLLEGE LEVEL OF ATHLETICS.

lender.name: Tom & Alice
lender.loan_because: My wife and I lived in India for a couple of years. We saw many small businesses that could really become solid with a modest capital source.
lender.occupational_info: I run a state owned, residential facility for about 100 developmentally disabled individuals.

lender.name: Lorenzo
lender.loan_because: networking business
lender.occupational_info: direct selling in networking

lender.name: Wernfrid
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help and I can choose exactly who the money is going to.
lender.occupational_info: I help people do smart things with their money.

lender.name: Bob & Mary
lender.loan_because: Bob and I feel that we have an obligation to help others. We are blessed to have jobs that allow us to do that but we want to do more.
lender.occupational_info: Bob teaches 5th grade children in elementary school , preparing them for the life that is ahead of them . I work with old people who live in nursing homes, helping them to get stronger and to be as independent as possible as they near the end of their lives.

lender.name: Inge
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Makes us feel good.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.occupational_info: I worked for 33 years in a consumer marketing research firm--helping food and household product companies make products that consumers want and need

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I can. Because it puts good back into the universe. Because I have been very fortunate in my life and I try to pass that on.

lender.name: jonathan
lender.loan_because:
We are blessed by God and charged with the good stewardship of the gifts he has given us.
There are many people who are not so blessed, and we can help them be good stewards as well.
lender.occupational_info: I sell household goods to people.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I would like to assist entrepreneurs who want a "hand up" not a "hand out."
lender.occupational_info: I managed investment and savings portfolios for individuals in Ontario, Canada utilizing stocks, bonds, mutual funds, GICs and life insurance products. As a retiree, I have many hobbies including genealogy and woodworking.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great idea and a fantastic site. Good Luck to everyone!
lender.occupational_info: I sell billboard advertising in Denver, CO.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I am thankful that God has blessed my life, and I hope to facilitate His blessings to others.
lender.occupational_info: Specializing in sinkhole and foundation repairs throughout the state of Florida.

lender.name: Tom & Danna
lender.loan_because: God has always been good to us, and we appreciate the chance to share His blessings with some of His other children.
lender.occupational_info: Working in communications, Thom writes news and magazine articles for a large company and also prepares and gives training courses. His daughter Danna recently graduated from high school and is preparing to enter university.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to help diminish the gap between rich and poor and this is my way to help with that.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find information about lots of topics and help them improve their lives free through the library.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: We believe that a loan through a wonderful program such as Kiva will help others achieve success in their lives through their own accomplishments.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: We are blessed so that we may bless others.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a kindergarten teacher.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help.
lender.occupational_info: I make video games for Playstations.

lender.name: charlotte
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher.

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: money is only useful if it flows
lender.occupational_info: click, charge, loan, repeat

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I may not have a lot of money, but sharing what I have makes all the difference.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in my last year of college. where I study English and journalism.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I know first hand the impact a small loan can have from receiving one a number of years ago. It changed my life and helped kick-start my business. I enjoy returning the favor and helping other fellow entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I should.
lender.occupational_info: I design web applications.

lender.name: Anne
lender.occupation: Executive Director, Society of St. Vincent de Paul
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to take what they know and build their dreams, no matter where they live or who they are.
lender.occupational_info: Faith-based charity offering emergency help for the poor.

lender.name: Dan and Lynne Faulkner
lender.loan_because: We have a desire to help others make this world a better place for the generations to come. We honor the memory of our beloved son Jess.

lender.name: Savani
lender.loan_because: I belive in capitalism. What better way than to encourage a society of enterprenuers than this!
lender.occupational_info: Developing software applications for genetic research.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful for the opportunity Kiva provides to help hardworking, deserving people around the world.

lender.name: Corina
lender.loan_because: I live in New Orleans and we've been through a lot the last couple of years, but I know that there are people out there that didn't even have what we had here before August 29, 2005. I like to see the specific people I'm helping with Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I teach language arts and writing to kids between the ages of 11-13. When I'm not doing that, I like to write stories about what the future will be like.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me so that I can bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I help create and distribute computer software.

lender.name: Maurie
lender.loan_because: humankind is a family and these are my brothers and sisters in need
lender.occupational_info: I write training materials to help adults learn new skill for their work

lender.name: Gilligan
lender.occupational_info: i sell music

lender.name: FAYE
lender.loan_because: God has blessed my husband and myself with stepping out and starting our own business 5 years ago. I want to bless others that are trying to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and his workers Repair and install electrical parts * equipment on ships. I do office work for our business.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to elementary students in South Korea.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I want to help others less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I am 75 years old and spend my days helping my grandchildren find their way in life through counsel and financial aid when needed.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: sabrina
lender.loan_because: I was given this as a gift because my friends know I really care about humanity. I am doing my best to help people and promote the greater good.
lender.occupational_info: I develop educational products for all ages. My real passion is responsible consumerism. I am creating workshops to teach people how to use their dollars wisely to help people around the world and to reduce their eco-footprint!

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: It feel's great!
lender.occupational_info: Mom, environmentalist

lender.name: Earl
lender.loan_because: Loan purposes are worthwhile and re-payment rates are good. Loan sharks need to be competed against by fair and reasonable interest rates. The borrowers appear to be decent and hardworking.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. Being on a fixed income, I do not have a lot to loan, but I have more than most borrowers; so, I am willing to help and able to manage micro-loans.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: it's the best way I can think of to give a hand-up instead of a hand-out.
lender.occupational_info: professional volunteer

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I feel that by doing this I might actually make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I make arrangements for people to travel to other cities and countries.

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: I see this as a way to surround the world with love.
lender.occupational_info: I help people create create health through simple lifestyle changes.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Microlending is brilliant in its simplicity and I feel honored to participate in the process.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I find it ultimately rewarding to help others to help themselves. I credit Kiva.org with their extraordinary concept (with the help of modern technology) to reach far across many lands for those people that may assist those in need. I loan because I want to make a difference and support this project.
lender.occupational_info: I handle spending for a large financial institution and produce music events.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to help people advance themselves through their own initiative.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: life is a blessing and to help others honors God
lender.occupational_info: I help people purchase homes and keep their homes if they are in financial trouble

lender.name: Ablla
lender.loan_because: I know the difference a loan can make in someone's life. It's a small thing to do, but it's the right thing.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a software company in Irvine, California.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: We are all accountable to each other.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children with disabilities.

lender.name: Leonard
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Hillevi & Bruce
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference. What better way than to band together and let someone know that we believe in them. How uplifting for us all.
lender.occupational_info: We are starting our own small business in residential real estate and personal property appraisal, and hot air ballooning in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Everyone willing to work should have the opportunity to succeed in their dreams.

lender.name: John and Tetyana
lender.loan_because: We give thanks to God for all the blessings He has given to us. Much is required of those who have been given much. We care for those who work hard to help themselves. May God Bless them.
lender.occupational_info: John and Tetyana are retired. Tetyana is a retired medical doctor originally from Ukraine. Like many others, she suffered during the collapse of the USSR and is sensitive to those who are working hard to improve their lives in Ukraine and Elsewhere.

lender.name: Rochelle
lender.loan_because: I have a passion for helping people

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: Everyone can use some help sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: Just spreading a few seeds of happiness...

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I want to make a contribution to someone else's success and happiness.
lender.occupational_info: For many years, I was a teacher of English as a Second Language in a community college.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I prefer to give a hand up than a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I help run a company that installs windshields in cars.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I would like to help in a more direct way that I know is going directly to the people in need. Helping another person improve their quality of life while keeping their dignity intact.
lender.occupational_info: I am back in school to finish a psychology/sociology degree.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate and truly blessed to have so much abundance in my life. I feel I have an obligation to help those less fortunate and Kiva affords a fantastic way of providing assistance to wonderful, hard-working people around the world who are trying to make their lives better.

lender.name: Frederick
lender.loan_because: My fellow man deserves a trusting hand. "What goes around - comes around"
lender.occupational_info: Helping the elderly, and the not-so-fortunate.

lender.name: Quicksilver
lender.loan_because: I loan because I like to help people when I can. Me being a kitten sometimes makes it hard to do because I don't have any money unless I sell some of my food to other cats, or kill a mouse.
lender.occupational_info: It's my job to keep mice & rats out of my owners house. When I catch a mouse and kill it dead, he rewards me by letting me make a loan to someone on Kiva.org. Wish there were more mice around here.

lender.name: Ed and Evan
lender.loan_because: Making a difference, however you can, is important.
lender.occupational_info: It maybe only a small thing, but it can lead to great things.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference for someone.
lender.occupational_info: I rent property to others so they can make a living.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: To share my good fortune with those in need.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I try to use technology to build systems that help people. Sometimes the systems I use are high tech electronics and sometimes they are low tech.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to help women who have a desire to better themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Before I retired it was my job to bring people together to find ways to solve problems and find ways to do things better.

lender.name: Asmah
lender.loan_because: many reasons
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I usually think I'm very poor, then I realize that I have more than most of the people in this world, and that makes me very grateful for my life.
